p: The antiradical scavenging potentials of the crude extracts were evaluated against the radicals of DPPH ( Brand-Williams et al., 1995), ABTS ( Adedapo et al., 2008); H 2O 2 ( Oyedemi et al., 2010), nitric oxide ( Garrat 1964) as well as ferric ion reducing ability by Oyaizu (1986) following standard procedures established in the literature.
